  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.javadocking.dockable.DraggableContent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class NewsPanel
extends DragablePanel
    Class for the Panel which contains all information about news the user can see.
    Author:
    Aris, Tristan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
